articles.title: Elon Musk targets telecom for next disruption with Starlink internet - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: SpaceX has told investors that Starlink is angling for a piece of a $1 trillion market made up of in-flight internet, maritime services, demand in China and India -- and rural customers.
